# IntentPerson.ParameterMode.phone

**Case**

The parameter shows an interface allowing the user to pick a phone number

## Declaration

```swift
case phone
```

## Getting the interface type

- **IntentPerson.ParameterMode.contact**: The parameter shows an interface allowing the user to pick a contact
- **IntentPerson.ParameterMode.email**: The parameter shows an interface allowing the user to pick an email
- **IntentPerson.ParameterMode.emailOrPhone**: The parameter shows an interface allowing the user to pick an email or phone number
